data.title: NEOM Bay Infrastructure - Consortium Partners Needed
data.description: Seeking qualified contractors to join a consortium for the NEOM Bay infrastructure development project. This is a major infrastructure project requiring expertise in marine works, utilities, and road construction. The project represents a significant opportunity to contribute to Saudi Vision 2030's flagship development.
data.location: Saudi Arabia > Tabuk > NEOM > The Line

exchangeData.exchangeTermsSummary: Payment will be distributed per scope of work completed. Initial mobilization payment of 10% upon contract signing, followed by monthly progress payments based on certified work.
exchangeData.cashMilestones: 10% mobilization, 20% monthly progress payments, 5% retention released upon completion

memberRoles.scope: Port and coastal infrastructure including breakwaters, quay walls, and dredging works
Water supply networks, electrical distribution, telecommunications infrastructure, and wastewater systems
Primary and secondary road networks, bridges, tunnels, and associated drainage
Green spaces, environmental works, and public realm development

minimumRequirements.requirement: Contractor Grade 1 Classification from Saudi Contractors Authority
Minimum 5 years experience in mega infrastructure projects valued at 100M+ SAR
Financial capability demonstrating ability to handle 100M+ SAR project value
Proven track record in similar marine/utilities/road projects

data.title: Senior Structural Engineer - Riyadh Metro Extension
data.description: Looking for an experienced structural engineer to join our team for the Riyadh Metro Line 7 extension project. Must have experience with underground structures and transit systems. This is a high-profile project contributing to Riyadh's public transportation infrastructure.
data.location: Saudi Arabia > Riyadh > Riyadh City > King Fahd District

exchangeData.exchangeTermsSummary: Monthly salary payment via bank transfer. Housing allowance and transportation provided separately. Medical insurance and annual tickets included.

attributes.jobDescription: Lead structural design and analysis for metro station structures including underground stations, elevated sections, and transition zones. Coordinate with MEP and architectural teams to ensure integrated design solutions. Review contractor submissions and provide technical oversight during construction. Prepare technical reports, calculations, and design documentation. Participate in design review meetings and client presentations.

data.title: Bulk Purchasing - Structural Steel (5000 Tons)
data.description: Organizing bulk purchase of structural steel for multiple construction projects. Join to benefit from volume discounts of 15-20% off market price. This is an opportunity to reduce material costs through collective purchasing power.
data.location: Saudi Arabia > Riyadh > Riyadh City > Al Olaya

exchangeData.exchangeTermsSummary: Payment via escrow account. 30% deposit upon order confirmation, 60% upon delivery, 10% retention released after quality inspection. Payment must be made within 7 days of invoice.

data.title: Sustainable Design Competition - KAFD Tower
data.description: Design competition for a 40-story sustainable office tower in King Abdullah Financial District. Open to architectural firms and independent architects. Winner will be awarded the full design contract worth 5M SAR.
data.location: Saudi Arabia > Riyadh > Riyadh City > King Fahd District

exchangeData.exchangeTermsSummary: Winner receives full design contract of 5M SAR. Top 3 finalists receive cash prizes: 1st place 5M SAR contract, 2nd place 500K SAR, 3rd place 250K SAR. Submission fee of 5,000 SAR required.

attributes.competitionScope: Design a 40-story net-zero energy office tower incorporating latest sustainable technologies, biophilic design principles, and Saudi architectural heritage elements. The design must achieve LEED Platinum certification and integrate smart building systems.

eligibilityCriteria.criteria: Licensed architectural firm or registered architect with valid professional license
Portfolio demonstrating at least 3 completed high-rise projects (30+ stories)
LEED or equivalent green building certification experience
Financial capability to complete design work

attributes.competitionRules: All submissions become property of the organizer. Winner will be awarded the full design contract. Top 3 finalists receive cash prizes. Submissions must be original work. No collaboration between participants allowed.

data.title: Strategic JV - Smart City Technology Solutions
data.description: Seeking technology partner for long-term joint venture to deliver smart city solutions across Saudi Arabia's giga-projects. This strategic partnership aims to establish market leadership in smart city infrastructure.
data.location: Saudi Arabia > Riyadh > Riyadh City > Al Olaya

exchangeData.exchangeTermsSummary: Hybrid structure: 60% equity stake for lead partner, 40% for technology partner. Initial capital investment of 50M SAR. Ongoing funding through mixed model of partner contributions and retained earnings.
exchangeData.hybridCashDetails: Initial capital of 50M SAR split 60/40. Additional funding as needed for projects.
exchangeData.hybridEquityDetails: 60% equity for lead partner (market access, local expertise), 40% for technology partner (IP, R&D)

attributes.strategicObjective: Establish market leadership in smart city infrastructure across Saudi giga-projects including NEOM, The Line, and Red Sea Project. Create a sustainable, long-term technology partnership that combines local market expertise with global technology innovation.
attributes.businessScope: IoT infrastructure, smart building systems, AI-powered facility management, and integrated city management platforms. Services include design, implementation, operation, and maintenance of smart city solutions.

partnerContributions.contribution: Market access, local expertise, government relations, project management, local workforce
Technology IP, R&D capabilities, global expertise, software platforms, technical support

attributes.governance: Board of Directors with equal representation. Major decisions require unanimous consent. Day-to-day operations managed by professional CEO. Strategic decisions require board approval.

partnerRequirements.requirement: Proven smart city technology portfolio with at least 3 major implementations
R&D investment exceeding 10% of annual revenue
International presence and proven track record
Strong IP portfolio in IoT and smart building technologies

data.title: Equipment Sharing - Tower Cranes (3 Units)
data.description: Looking for partners to co-own 3 Liebherr tower cranes. Ideal for contractors with intermittent crane needs. Shared ownership reduces individual capital investment while ensuring equipment availability.

exchangeData.exchangeTermsSummary: Initial investment of 3M SAR per co-owner. Ongoing costs shared proportionally based on usage. Monthly cost allocation based on actual usage hours.

ongoingCosts.frequency: Monthly per unit when in use

data.title: Sustainability Consultant - LEED Certification
data.description: Need experienced sustainability consultant for LEED Platinum certification of our new headquarters building. Seeking expert with proven track record in LEED certification processes.
data.location: Saudi Arabia > Riyadh > Riyadh City > Al Olaya

exchangeData.exchangeTermsSummary: Payment milestones: 30% upon contract signing, 40% upon completion of design phase documentation, 20% upon construction phase completion, 10% upon final LEED certification.
exchangeData.cashMilestones: 30% contract signing, 40% design phase, 20% construction phase, 10% certification

attributes.scopeOfWork: Lead LEED certification process from design through construction. Coordinate with design team, review specifications, manage documentation, and interface with GBCI. Provide guidance on sustainable design strategies, energy modeling, material selection, and indoor environmental quality. Conduct site visits and prepare all required documentation for LEED submission.

data.title: Task-Based: Structural Review of Bridge Design
data.description: Independent structural review required for a 500m cable-stayed bridge design. Peer review for client submission. Seeking expert structural engineer with bridge design experience.

exchangeData.exchangeTermsSummary: Payment upon completion and delivery of review report. Full payment within 14 days of report acceptance.

attributes.detailedScope: Comprehensive peer review of structural design calculations, drawings, and specifications for a 500m cable-stayed bridge. Review includes foundation design, deck structure, cable system, and seismic analysis. Provide detailed review report with recommendations and marked-up drawings.
attributes.deliverableFormat: Technical Review Report with marked-up drawings, calculation review, and recommendations in PDF format

data.title: Mentorship Program - Young Engineers
data.description: Experienced engineers wanted to mentor fresh graduates entering the construction industry. Part of our Vision 2030 workforce development initiative. Paid mentorship opportunity.
data.location: Saudi Arabia > Riyadh > Riyadh City > Al Olaya

exchangeData.exchangeTermsSummary: Monthly compensation of 5,000 SAR per mentee. Payment made at the end of each month upon submission of mentorship activity report.

attributes.menteeBackground: Recent engineering graduates (0-2 years experience) from Saudi universities. Focus on civil, mechanical, and electrical engineering disciplines.

data.title: Surplus Construction Materials - Sell/Barter
data.description: Excess materials from completed project available for sale or barter. Includes rebar, formwork, and electrical supplies. All items in good condition, stored properly. Open to barter for materials, equipment, or services.
data.location: Saudi Arabia > Makkah > Jeddah > Al Balad

exchangeData.exchangeTermsSummary: Open to barter exchange for precast elements, ready-mix concrete credits, equipment rental credits, or professional services. Estimated value 2.5M SAR. Willing to negotiate terms.
exchangeData.barterOffer: Package includes: 200 tons rebar (various sizes), 5000 sqm aluminum formwork (PERI system), 500 electrical panels, and miscellaneous MEP materials. All items in good condition, stored properly.
exchangeData.barterNeed: Precast elements, ready-mix concrete credits, equipment rental credits, or professional services (engineering, design, consulting)

attributes.detailedDescription: Package includes: 200 tons rebar (various sizes: 12mm, 16mm, 20mm, 25mm), 5000 sqm aluminum formwork (PERI system, excellent condition), 500 electrical panels (various ratings), and miscellaneous MEP materials including conduits, cables, and fixtures. All items in good condition, stored properly in covered warehouse.
attributes.barterOffer: Open to barter for: precast elements, ready-mix concrete credits, equipment rental credits, or professional services

data.title: Project Management Consulting - Available for Hire
data.description: We offer experienced project management consulting for construction and infrastructure projects. Our team provides planning, scheduling, risk management, and PMO setup. Available for short-term or long-term engagements across Saudi Arabia and the GCC.
data.location: Saudi Arabia > Riyadh > Riyadh City > Al Olaya

exchangeData.exchangeTermsSummary: Daily or monthly rates. Payment within 30 days of invoice. Retainer options available for ongoing support.

attributes.scopeOfWork: Provide project management support including planning, scheduling, risk management, and PMO setup. On-site or remote. Flexible duration.

data.title: Crane and Heavy Equipment - Available for Lease
data.description: We offer crane and heavy equipment for lease. Liebherr and Tadano cranes available for short or long-term rental. Full operator and maintenance support. Ideal for contractors needing flexible capacity without capital investment.

exchangeData.exchangeTermsSummary: Daily, weekly, or monthly rates. Operator included. Maintenance and insurance included in lease.

attributes.assetDescription: Liebherr and Tadano mobile and tower cranes - multiple units

data.title: BIM and Design Services - Offering Task-Based Delivery
data.description: We offer BIM modeling and design services on a task-based basis. Experienced team in Revit, Navisworks, and 4D/5D. Available for design packages, clash detection, and as-built documentation. Fixed price per deliverable.

exchangeData.exchangeTermsSummary: Fixed price per deliverable. 30% upfront, 70% upon delivery. Payment within 14 days of acceptance.

attributes.detailedScope: BIM modeling, clash detection, 4D/5D simulation, and as-built documentation. Deliverables per agreed package.

data.title: Strategic Alliance - Offering Technology Partnership
data.description: We offer a strategic technology partnership for smart building and IoT solutions. Our firm brings proven platforms, R&D capability, and implementation experience. Seeking long-term alliance with local partners for Saudi and GCC markets.
data.location: Saudi Arabia > Riyadh > Riyadh City > Al Olaya

exchangeData.exchangeTermsSummary: Alliance structure flexible: revenue share, equity participation, or hybrid. Open to discussion.

attributes.strategicObjective: Offer technology partnership for smart city and smart building solutions in Saudi and GCC.
attributes.businessScope: IoT platforms, smart building systems, AI-powered facility management.
